title: SMC_OutQueueIsSyncing (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SMC_OutQueueIsSyncing : BOOL
Returns whether the queue is syncing,
i.e. if it is to be emptied completely before being refilled.
This is done if a G75 command is issued, which is stored as a
m-function with m-value -2.
task-safety: may be called from both tasks
